item.title: UTV Adventure Tour / Rental
item.description: Take an off-road adventure in the Red Sands area of eastern El Paso with this tour. A professional guide will take you and your party out on a utility terrain vehicle (UTV) tour, riding in a separate buggy so that you can enjoy the thrill of commanding your own vehicle, and will be on hand to provide support and instruction so that you can make the most of your time, safely.

item.title: Sun City Ghosts Haunted Cowboys and Outlaws Tour
item.description:
Come on our Sun City Ghosts Haunted Cowboys and Outlaws Tour by US Ghost Adventures!
For a trip back in time that includes visits to places of historical significance and stories that didn’t make the history book, what better way than a tour with Sun City Ghosts?
The role Texas played in the formation of the United States is a major one, so it’s easy to see why it’s shrouded in deep history that is both monumental and otherworldly.
This isn’t like any history lesson you’ve ever slept through. Educational and engaging, this tour will take you on a trip through centuries of history and hauntings. Texas history includes so much more than we were taught in school, and Sun City Ghosts is where you’ll hear it.
These aren’t your run-of-the-mill ghost stories that you’ll hear. Our research team has uncovered terrifying true accounts of unexplained activity that range from spirit sightings to inexplicable voices and sounds to being touched by unidentified beings.

image.alt: Sun City Ghosts Haunted Cowboys and Outlaws Tour

item.title: Self Guided El Paso Scavenger Hunt: Sun City Scavenger Hunt
item.description: Make getting to know the city fun with this El Paso scavenger hunt. Using just your smartphone, you and your crew will explore the city on foot, hunting for clues, solving trivia, and visiting the city’s historic, cultural, and natural landmarks. Travel at your pace, team up as you like, and discover El Paso’s hidden side, right from your phone.

image.alt: Self Guided El Paso Scavenger Hunt: Sun City Scavenger Hunt

item.title: Las Cruces El Paso Weekend Wine Tour
item.description:
Leave your cares and your car behind while exploring the charm of New Mexico’s wineries. Savor the rich aroma of oak barrels as you taste rich red wines. Laugh with newfound friends over a glass of rosé under the heat of the desert sun. Let the gentle hum of live music set the rhythm for the day as you sip your new favorite white wine. Each stop offers new flavors, a new story—designed to leave you with lasting memories of a day well spent.
Set Your Own Pace We spend about one hour at each location to give you time to savor your wine, enjoy live music, take pictures, and socialize. Drinks are not included and range from $5 - $20 at each stop.
Expert Tour Guide You’ll learn about local history, get wine tasting tips, and listen to great music between stops.
For Visitors and Locals Whether you’re visiting for the first time, hosting guests from out of town, or looking for a new way to experience your favorite places, our Weekend Wine Tours are unforgettable.

image.alt: Las Cruces El Paso Weekend Wine Tour

item.title: El Paso City Scavenger Hunt by Zombie Scavengers
item.description: Zombie Scavengers takes you on an adventure in El Paso to survive the zombie apocalypse! Use our app and some strategy to find a list of items needed to survive, in any order you'd prefer, around the city. Find the survival items to get points and do fun zombie themed challenges for points as well. Contrive a plan to get your survival team the most points in order to survive the apocalypse! Your remote host will follow along virtually and provide support if you need it. Can you survive the apocalypse in El Paso?

image.alt: El Paso City Scavenger Hunt by Zombie Scavengers

item.title: El Paso International Airport (ELP) to El Paso - Arrival Private Transfer
item.description: No need to bother with waiting in long taxi lines or making unnecessary stops on a shared shuttle. Instead, arrive at El Paso International Airport (ELP) stress-free, knowing your private driver is waiting for you. Find them waiting with a nameplate, then make your way to your comfortable vehicle for a door-to-door transfer to your destination in El Paso.

image.alt: El Paso International Airport (ELP) to El Paso - Arrival Private Transfer

item.title: Get in the holiday spirit with a scavenger hunt by Holly Jolly Hunt in El Paso
item.description: Holly Jolly Hunt is a scavenger hunt that is played using an app on your smartphone, that brings your entire family and friends together for holiday cheer. During the adventure you’ll be seeking out all the traditional, and even the non-traditional holiday items we all see this time of year around the city. You’ll get points for each item you find. The goal is to capture as many items as you can in order to score as many points as possible and get 1st place on the leaderboard. Along the way you’ll be asked to perform silly holiday themed tasks meant to bring laughter and smiles to everyone involved. Come play with us. Young or old, this is a scavenger hunt for everyone that enjoys this time of year. We promise you will create holiday memories that you will not forget! Holly Jolly Hunt can be played in any city!

image.alt: Get in the holiday spirit with a scavenger hunt by Holly Jolly Hunt in El Paso

item.title: Scavenger Hunt in El Paso by Operation City Quest
item.description: Discover the highlights of El Paso, Texas in a different way as you embark on an app-led scavenger hunt through the city. Your goal is to find a variety of items in the city by completing challenges and solving puzzles. Earn points for every item you find, which puts you in competition with other teams across the nation.

image.alt: Scavenger Hunt in El Paso by Operation City Quest

item.title: Self-Guided Bar Hunt: Extreme El Paso
item.description:
Let’s Roam is the #1 app-led adventure hunt company! Embark on an exciting journey to explore all the best landmarks and uncover hidden gems, while tackling trivia questions and conquering challenges. Whether you’re working with your team or competing against them, you’ll discover new facts and create unforgettable experiences along the way.
Let’s Roam Adventure Hunts are perfect for everyday excitement, as well as for spicing up bachelorette parties, birthday celebrations, corporate team building events, and more! Each player selects an interactive role, with challenges tailored to their skills and interests. Get ready for an adventure-filled experience with Let’s Roam!

image.alt: Self-Guided Bar Hunt: Extreme El Paso

item.title: Shuttle Service to or from El Paso, TX Airport to Columbus, NM
item.description: Enjoy safe and experienced transportation to and from El Paso, TX International airport to the Village of Columbus, NM. Our route takes along a non-stop 60 mile stretch along Highway 9 paralleling the international border wall to our south, and the high desert plains of New Mexico everywhere else.

image.alt: Shuttle Service to or from El Paso, TX Airport to Columbus, NM

item.title: El Paso International Airport (ELP) to El Paso - Round-Trip Private Transfer
item.description:
Book your Private Round-Trip Transfer from El Paso International Airport (ELP) to El Paso hotel or address and return.
Don't go through all the hassle of waiting in a long taxi or shared shuttles queues and use our private, door to door airport transfer.
Your driver will be waiting for you at a scheduled time and you will travel comfortably to your destination.
• Meeting with a Nameplate • We track your Flight • Door-to-door Service • No Hidden Charges • Clean cars & Professional drivers

image.alt: El Paso International Airport (ELP) to El Paso - Round-Trip Private Transfer

item.title: Adventurous Scavenger Hunt in El Paso by Wacky Walks
item.description: Wacky Walks of El Paso let's your team discover your city in a fun way! Our adventure is a royal themed scavenger hunt that is all played using an app. Throughout the game your group members will face off and compete to become the King or Queen. The King/Queen will lead the other members of the group to complete wacky tasks and find items around the city for points. The objective of Wacky Walks is to hang on to your King/Queen title the longest and try to get as many points as possible by doing the tasks and finding the items. You are welcome to explore any area of the city that you'd like and take as much time as you need, Wacky Walks is not timed. During the game, a remote host will be following along virtually and chatting with you if you need any help! Come explore your Kingdom of El Paso today!

image.alt: Adventurous Scavenger Hunt in El Paso by Wacky Walks

item.title: Private Downtown City Sightseeing Tour of Juarez Mexico
item.description: We take a sightseeing tour of the city and then we head downtown for the walking tour, remember we customize your itinerary so you can see and enjoy your day

item.title: El Paso Prowl Scavenger Hunt
item.description: No more walking tours or pub crawls—it’s time to discover El Paso with your crew via interactive scavenger hunt. Your smartphone guiding you across Texas’s border city, you’ll solve puzzles, collect items, complete wild challenges, and rack up points along the way. Should you need hints, your remote host is there to help, but try to do this one on your way. This one’s all about wits, teamwork, and winning.

item.title: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in El Paso by 3Quest Challenge
item.description: Explore El Paso with 3Quest Challenge! Our scavenger hunt let's you explore the city to find items (given to you in the form of a riddle) and perform fun tasks for points. These items and tasks are provided to you on our scavenger hunt app and are divided into 3 different quests! Find all items in quest 1, then quest 2, then quest 3 to complete 3Quest Challenge! If you'd like to make the game even more intense, set a time limit for yourself for 2 hours and see how many quests you can complete in the allotted time. You'll have a remote host during the game that will communicate with you via chat if you need help. Get out and explore El Paso with 3Quest Challenge!

image.alt: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in El Paso by 3Quest Challenge
